## Checklist

## Reviewer Notes

<!-- For reviewers: areas to focus on, questions, concerns -->



---

**Before requesting review:**
1. Ensure all checkboxes above are completed
2. Verify CI checks pass
3. Rebase on latest main if needed
4. Squash fixup commits
5. Ensure PR title follows conventional commits format

**For reviewers:**
- Check code quality and adherence to style guide
- Verify tests cover new functionality
- Consider edge cases and error handling
- Validate documentation updates
- Test locally if possible
